name: Tappy Plane (francispasive)
description:
Hi guys. Tappy Plane is basically a angry bird clone. I only made this game just to experience the whole process of game dev from scratch to finish and also uploading a game here in itch io. Visuals/art are from kenney's free assets.

RULES:
  • Tap/mouse left-click/space-bar to jump
  • Collect stars
